column1: Dementia: Causes, Treatments and Research (Neuroscience) MSc
column5: Register your interest in graduate study at UCLThe Dementia: Causes, Treatments and Research (Neuroscience) MSc, offered by the UCL Queen Square Institute of Neurology, tackles one of the biggest global health problems facing society today. It provides research-oriented and cutting-edge training in the study of dementia and its scientific basis, led by international leaders in the science and practice of dementia.
column7: Register your interest in graduate study at UCL
column9: 1 year full time, 2 years part time
